name: Adam Giese
body:
# Howdy.

## Who Am I?

I am the Senior Web Developer at [Intelechy Group](http://intelechygroup.com) in Austin, TX. 

## What Can I Do?

I can create kickass WordPress themes! Working with [The MOD Studio](http://themodstudio.com), a partner of Intelechy Group, I have worked on WordPress themes for many different clients and industries. 

I am getting my feet wet with Jekyll, and I am _loving_ it! While I do not have any professional examples (yet), I am currently creating a Jekyll theme where this site will eventually live.

## More Is On The Way!

This site is a placeholder! I will be populating this with blog posts, portfolio pages, and more!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
